answers.answer: The process of what?  The test? You go into the lab- you don't have to fast,  but should load up on carbs either.  They give a a jacked up sugary drink and then draw your blood after an hour. If you pass you're fine.  If not you go back for a more in depth fasting three hour test.  The text is designed to measure how your body metabolizes glucose (sugar/carbs)
Do they tell me right then and there if i pass?

No, it takes a few days (at most) to process the results.  You're doc will call you usually only if there's a problem. And even if you don't pass the first it didn't mean you have GD.  Many pass the three hour test even after failing the one hour.
Ahhh okay thanks! I hope the drink isn't So bad that it kills me lol
Haha, the drinking great, but it's bearable

I live in kansas they do not do the 1 hour test they go straight to the 3 hour test. I have my test done then when to eat because i was starving and before i got home i got a call saying my test came back positive :-( it took them less then two hours, it may depend on the place you take it.
